Row.Text: All Naval Units gain the [icon:UNIT_CAUTION] Pirate Ability, allowing them to cross borders of other Civilizations, [icon:Action_Pillage] Plunder Trade Routes from non-Allied Civilizations, and attack Naval Units of non-Allied Civilizations without declaring [icon:WAR] War. Defeating any Naval Unit with your own Naval Units provides [icon:YIELD_GOLD] Gold equal to 50% of its [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength and captures that Unit under your control. +1 Gold Maintenance for Naval Units.
